title: Jonathon Reed and the Thirteenth Crystal Skull
description: “Trust in who you are and who you need to be. That will allow you to trust only those that SHOULD be trusted because you will be able to see in them those things that CAN be trusted.” - Jonathon Reed and the Thirteenth Crystal Skull by Darrin Mason.The earth begins to shake and the city of Atlantis begins to crumble. Twelve priestesses take twelve of thirteen crystal skulls to pre-determined places around Atlantis before it is destroyed forever. A mountain of rubble buries the thirteenth skull and it appears to be lost for all time. But it is not. It is found and passed from one generation to the next until James Gee, a spiritualist with a secret past, comes into its possession and gives it to a teenage Jonathon Reed. When the crystal skull disappears from Jonathon’s bedroom, he finds himself drawn into a web of lies, deceit and murder spun by the man who promised him a life of love, light and spirituality and instead helps turn him into a killer.
author: Darrin Mason
